section.title: Configuring Updates
section.para: CentOS Studio creates a configuration package by default, even if no config element is specified in the definition. In the default case, the configuration package performs just two actions:

itemizedlist.listitem: Installs a plugin module for YUM that allows synchronizing packages on the client machine with packages in the solution repository. See for more information on the YUM Sync Plugin.
Installs a repository definition for the at /etc/yum.repos.d/samba-server.repo.

section.para: The sync plugin can be excluded from the configuration package using the config/updates element. See the SDFR for more information on YUM update configuration using the /config/updates element. In addition, the sync plugin can be disabled on individual client machines using the /etc/yum/yumplugin.d/sync.conf file.
For the samba-server example, you will use the default update settings.
